content: I'll definitely check out those resources, thanks! I'm also planning to ask Sarah about her new job in marketing, and maybe even get some advice on how to break into the industry. By the way, I've been trying to be more active on the dating scene lately, and I recently attended a book club meeting at a local bookstore. I met some interesting people, including a guy named Alex who shares my love for sci-fi novels. We exchanged numbers, and I'm planning to meet up with him soon to discuss our favorite authors. Do you have any tips on how to make a good impression on a first date?
